title: Blessed Assurance

author.name: Fanny J. Crosby
author.bio: Fanny J. Crosby was a prolific American hymn writer and poet who wrote over 8,000 hymns. Despite being blind from infancy, she is considered one of the most important hymnists in history, and her works have inspired generations of believers.

lyrics:
1
Blessed assurance, Jesus is mine!
Oh, what a foretaste of glory divine!
Heir of salvation, purchase of God,
born of his Spirit, washed in his blood.

Chorus:
This is my story, this is my song,
praising my Savior all the day long.
This is my story, this is my song,
praising my Savior all the day long.

2
Perfect communion, perfect delight,
visions of rapture now burst on my sight.
Angels descending bring from above
echoes of mercy, whispers of love.

3
